description:
Learn what to do when you get to tie two...or more! Murphy Blue presents this engaging demonstration of Multi-Person Bondage, or â€œSure, You can get tied up, too!â€ When you add a second rope bottom into the mix, you add a second set of needs, desires, and expectations. This tutorial focuses on some concepts and tips to help you keep everyone as connected in the scene as possible, even if there are no knots holding them there.
For more information on rope suspension techniques, see Kink University's Suspension Safety tutorial featuring Lew Rubens.
title: Multi-Person Rope Bondage & Suspension
